title: NPR's Car Talk lets me down
body: I was so happy to see <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/02/05/463.aspx">NPR switch from Real to Microsoft</a>.  Now <a href="http://slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=04/04/05/1741214">the jerks</a> have switched back.  I wonder if the files play with the <a href="http://www.k-litecodecpack.com/">Real Alternative</a>?
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-06

NPR's Car Talk lets me down

I was so happy to see

bodyNavItems.text: NPR's Car Talk lets me down
greed vs. long term stability vs. laziness
